data.message:
I am what ever you say I am.
If I wasn't why would I say I am.
I am in the news the papers. 
It's true; every place I am in.
I am, every day I am.
I don't know but that's just the way it is.
These words are barely understood that's why the radio won't play my shit.
And if one could come to understand; just maybe they could play dj and spit another real mix.
Tell me after you catch that verse and come get me!
I've been waiting for some composition; but not so much. Did you hear that? Huh! Are you catchin that?! 
If so we'd better be getting a silent moment for such commitment - and set a spark of light for that flame of such inspiration .
I tell you that's the life I live!

Lmfol! I was on a whole other level that day that I thought I heard this song. I'm not sure if I did it or you but that's what was in my head.
